title: Local Hour: Miami Heat Media Day
description:
Chris Cote and Witty head to the FTX Arena to ask the difficult questions to various members of the Miami Heat and Izzy Gutierrez including what you do with your gum when you're done with it, naming more parts of the court after body parts, Udonis Haslem, and using your name to get restaurant reservations.
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices

Chris Cote and Witty head to the FTX Arena to ask the difficult questions to various members of the Miami Heat and Izzy Gutierrez including what you do with your gum when you're done with it, naming more parts of the court after body parts, Udonis Haslem, and using your name to get restaurant reservations.
